item.title: Man accused of elaborate plot to get rid of wife found guilty of double murder
item.description: The former IRS agent was charged with aggravated murder in 2024 following a monthslong investigation.

item.title: WATCH: Horse lays down some sweet guitar licks
item.description: A rescue horse named Yupia was captured in a sweet video strumming the guitar alongside his owner.
